summary: adds female master assassin as your companion
descriptionHtml:
This is my first companion

UFO compatible
no other mods required
marriable



[b]-description-[/b] 
Esther served as a member of Dark Brotherhood for years, however left the sanctuary by betraying her cousin, Astrid, after knowing that Astrid was responsible for her father\'s death.


[b]-characteristics-[/b]
boyish looking
extreme pale skin
CBBE slim body
has many assassin-related perks


[b]-equipment-[/b]
DB fulll sets without hood
Daedric Dagger (enchanted)


[b]-location-[/b]
Bannered Inn in Whiterun
she should be at the first floor but somtimes drinks at upstair for no reason....


[b]-installation-[/b]
you know what to do


[b]-warning-[/b]
If you have version lower than 1.5 or low vram/ram, your skyrim might not load up the textures properly causing the black face. if that happens, just reload your game.


[b]-Credits(mod I used)-[/b]
Nidias face by nightshade(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7485)
CBBE slim body by Caliente (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666)
Rans head mesh type D by Rans (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127)
coolsims hair by Richard (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4744)
Thanks for making such great mods you :)


[b]-recommanded mods-[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12864] Rangers Cape [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696] Black Sacrament sets [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037] UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul [/url]

[b]-update-[/b]
fixed some issues
stats updated (more assassin-like)
use UFO command to make her the master assassin (\"train some you are too weak\")
ㄴ(she should have 100 sneak, 100 one-handed, 89 archery, etc...)




thanks :)
author: Reavy
